title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 129.2 - Facilities not covered
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 129.2 - Facilities not covered

State Regulations

Such permit does not apply to the installation of new
facilities or to a relocation of existing facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
129.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
